Description:
Signature design in an enviable enclave
Enjoying picturesque views from its elevated, top-of-court position, this 4 bedroom brick veneer home is in perfect harmony with its surrounds. Large sliding doors provide an effortless transition between indoors and out, making it ideal for entertaining.
The split-level home commences with the living zone, where a lounge and dining room adjoins a family/meals room, both accessing the paved alfresco terrace and landscaped gardens. Angled timber-lined ceilings with fans complement polished Pine floorboards and a crisp colour scheme.
Adjoining a well-appointed laundry, the galley-style kitchen has been renovated to feature a stainless steel Westinghouse 900mm cooker and a Fisher and Paykel dual-drawer dishwasher, along with concealed microwave/appliance storage.
The first level features 2 bedrooms and 2 renovated bathrooms featuring rain showers and stone-topped vanities. The master bedroom enjoys a wall of fitted wardrobes, backyard access and an ensuite, while bedroom 2 adjoins the family bathroom with a bath. The top floor has another 2 bedrooms with views.
Highlights include: gas ducted heating, a split system air conditioning, Bosch temperature-controlled instant gas hot water, a garden shed and carport.
This blissfully quiet court lies in a coveted enclave near Eastfield Mall shops and restaurants, Ringwood East station, Maroondah Hospital and Cheong Park and Wildflower Sanctuary, with a short commute to Croydon, Eastland and EastLink access.
An adjacent laneway accesses a park with a playground and this light-filled home is within easy reach of Tintern Grammar, Tinternvale and Eastwood Primary Schools.
Also visit the stand alone website at: www.10cameliacourtcroydonsouth.com

- Living areas access a paved terrace
- Chic and contemporary bathrooms
- Stainless steel kitchen appliances
- Polished floorboards
- Near shops, station and Tintern schools

PRIVATE AND LUXURIOUS HOME IN COURT LOCATION
Offering only the best in luxury living and convenience, this exemplary showpiece of a family home is designed for effortless living and entertaining on approximately 914m2. Comprising three living areas, four bedrooms plus study, ensuite to master, family bathroom and a powder room as well as outdoor entertaining in an extensive garden. This immaculate executive residence is in a unique pocket of 21 beautiful homes. The open plan kitchen features a gas cooktop, stainless steel appliances and a huge island bench. The meals and lounge areas are great for all occasion living and for the more formal occasions, there is a dedicated formal lounge and dining area to the front of the house as well as a living area upstairs. In summer, take the fun outdoors to the large outdoor entertaining zone and the securely fenced expansive backyard offers plenty of room for the kids to play. The huge master bedroom comes with its own walk-in dressing room and a full ensuite with spa. In addition, there are three other double bedrooms, all with BIRs. There are many mature fruit trees on this block, cultivated over the years with much love by the current owner, an avid and experienced planter. Features of the home include gas ducted heating, reverse cycle air-conditioning and evaporative cooling to ensure constant interior comfort all year round. To keep your water bill down, there is a 4,500 litre water tank that provides sufficient water to the garden in summer. Quality schools such as Tintern Grammar are just around the corner as well as Yarra Valley Grammar a bit further down. Getting everywhere is easy as you are well located to enjoy the convenience of Eastlink, Ringwood, Bayswater, Ringwood East and Heathmont train stations. Delightful walking trails, cafes, shops parks and playgrounds are plentiful.
